Summary Note:
Frieda Benita Lorenz and the RM met at a networking event in Berlin. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Frieda Benita Lorenz is a 64 year old and comes from Germany.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Frieda Benita Lorenz is currently divorced. Her children are named Schäfer and Juliane.
Education Background:
In 1978, Frieda finished her secondary school education at Albert-Einstein-Gymnasium Ulm.
After that, she went on to study at ISM Dortmund until 1984.
Occupation History:
Frieda Benita Lorenz is a 64 year old retired Fleet Manager from Germany.
Frieda Benita Lorenz's first role was as a Ship Broker at Kühne + Nagel (Deutschland) GmbH, where she worked diligently from 1985 to 1986 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1986, she moved to DSV Air & Sea GmbH to work as a Shipping Company Owner, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a Fleet Manager at DSV Air & Sea GmbH from 1989 till retirement was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 1690000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has townhouse located in Nuremberg, worth 1650000 EUR.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
